metadata.title: CVE-2024-50161 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Check the remaining info_cnt before repeating btf fieldsWhen trying to repeat the btf fields for array of nested struct, itdoesn't check the remaining info_cnt. The following splat will bereported when the value of ret * nelems is greater than BTF_FIELDS_MAX:  ------------[ cut here ]------------  UBSAN: array-index-out-of-bounds in ../kernel/bpf/btf.c:3951:49  index 11 is out of range for type 'btf_field_info [11]'  CPU: 6 UID: 0 PID: 411 Comm: test_progs ...... 6.11.0-rc4+ #1  Tainted: [O]=OOT_MODULE  Hardware name: QEMU Standard PC (i440FX + PIIX, 1996), BIOS ...  Call Trace:   <TASK>   dump_stack_lvl+0x57/0x70   dump_stack+0x10/0x20   ubsan_epilogue+0x9/0x40   __ubsan_handle_out_of_bounds+0x6f/0x80   ? kallsyms_lookup_name+0x48/0xb0   btf_parse_fields+0x992/0xce0   map_create+0x591/0x770   __sys_bpf+0x229/0x2410   __x64_sys_bpf+0x1f/0x30   x64_sys_call+0x199/0x9f0   do_syscall_64+0x3b/0xc0   entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x4b/0x53  RIP: 0033:0x7fea56f2cc5d  ......   </TASK>  ---[ end trace ]---Fix it by checking the remaining info_cnt in btf_repeat_fields() beforerepeating the btf fields.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-50161` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required
